short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of 'King Charles Spaniel' with 'Freedom Spaniel', except on YouTube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the revolutionary new Chrome extension - "Cavalier Freedom Spaniel"! Tired of seeing the same old boring text "Cavalier King Charles Spaniel" everywhere you go on the internet? Well, fear not, because this extension will replace every instance of that long-winded phrase with the much more democratic and exciting "Cavalier Freedom Spaniel"!

Whether you're browsing dog breed blogs, reading up on the latest grooming techniques, or just admiring cute puppy pictures, this extension will add a touch of larakin Aussie spirit to your online experience. No longer will you be burdened with the oppressive monarchy of King Charles - instead, your screen will be filled with the brave and free spirit of the Cavalier Freedom Spaniel!

So why wait? Download the Cavalier Freedom Spaniel extension today and join the ranks who refuse to bow down to canine royalty. Because let's face it, who needs a king when you've got freedom?
